snippet.title: Puzkin: Magnetic Odyssey - First Look Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Step into the world of Puzkin: Magnetic Odyssey, a family-friendly sandbox MMORPG that combines exploration, creativity, and adventure. 

Journey through a mesmerizing, magnetic universe where pure-hearted children become heroes. 

Created by a team of industry veterans from renowned franchises like Final Fantasy, Paper Mario, and Monster Hunter, Puzkin promises a safe, vibrant, and engaging experience for all ages. 

Watch our alpha footage trailer for an exclusive first look at the adventure that awaits across iOS, Android, PC, Mac, and Switch!
